items.preText: A target of 199 shouldn't be a difficult task but there is some variable bounce. Here are Tamim Iqbal and Liton Das. Kemar Roach with the new ball, one slip in place. Hetmyer is keeping wickets.
items.text: length ball around the wicket, on middle and leg and tucked away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Amit Bharara: "Did Shai Hope carried the bat?" -- The technical definition is the team should be all out
items.text: fuller outside off, leans into the drive and sends it past the mid-off fielder on his left for the first boundary of the innings
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: shortens his length a bit, Das was looking to drive again, the ball hits the inner half on rolls towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball, on middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length again, around fifth stump, defended with an angled bat this time
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: punched off the back foot, crunched through covers this time for the second four of the over
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.preText: Roston Chase from the other end
items.text: short outside off, goes back and cuts but straight to backward point
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length around the wicket, spinning away, left alone
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: kamran sohail: "I was following Aug Vs India Test Match, at the end cricinfo says to follow bangla and WI match, in out language we say "mujy tari lat lag gayee" mean can't live without you :D" -- That's so sweet of you
items.text: flighted outside off, comes forward and soft-hands it on the off side
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward to defend but deliberately stays inside the line and lets the ball go
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of length, goes back and cuts it past the backward point for his first boundary
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, flicked past short midwicket for one
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on middle and leg, helped with the angle towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller and angling on to the pads once more, tucked away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length, on middle and leg, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length once more, angling on middle and off, defended again
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: a similar line and length, stays in the crease and blocks again
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Anik: "Shai Hope scored almost 55% of team total, so , is there any stat about this types of ratio? What is highest percentage of run any players score comapared to team total in a single match ?" -- You can check the full list here as we add Hope's name
items.text: fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover but straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, chipped uppishly down the ground, mid-off is at the boundary
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Only once a West Indies player has carried his bat in ODIs with team all out. Ridley Jacobs during his 49* against Australia
items.text: length outside off, spin and bounce as Liton goes back for the cut, gets cramped as he chops it down
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length outside off, spinning back sharply again, dabbed towards backward point
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: and some extra bounce once again, length outside off, Liton goes back and dabs it on the off side
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: a touch flatter on off and middle this time, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, tucked away but straight to square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run
